resources.string:
GPSToggler is a widget based program. It can turn on and off GPS even for those ROMs and kernels other widgets fail.

	This widget requires the root access.

	Single click on the widget toggles the GPS. Double click - launches this panel.

	The widget may enable/disable GPS when Waze, iGO or Google Maps (de)activated (experimental).
\tThe application may also turn on/off your Bluetooth device
\tIf you wish to uninstall the application first press \'Uninstall\' to remove the system module.
